text: Roger Pingeon (; 28 August 1940 - 19 March 2017) was a professional French road bicycle racer. He raced as a professional from 1964 to 1974. In 1967, Pingeon won the Tour de France. In 1969, Pingeon won the Vuelta a España and finished second behind Eddy Merckx in the 1969 Tour de France.Roger Pingeon . cyclingarchives.com He was born in Hauteville-Lompnes, Ain, France.
